feature1.explanation: Paragraph 1 uses proper punctuation with commas and periods. Paragraph 2 has more casual punctuation with dashes and exclamation marks.

feature2.explanation: Paragraph 1 demonstrates formal language with technical terms. Paragraph 2 uses informal language with slang.

feature3.explanation: Paragraph 1 has longer and more complex sentences. Paragraph 2 has shorter and simpler sentences.

feature4.explanation: Paragraph 1 presents a formal narrative style. Paragraph 2 adopts a more casual and confrontational tone.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are free from spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in punctuation style, lexical, grammatical features, sentence structure, and discourse features, the texts are unlikely to be written by the same author.
